name: Wheat
description: Premium Sharbati wheat grown in Punjab's fertile soil. Rich in gluten (14% protein) with golden-brown grains. Ideal for chapatis, produces soft texture with good elasticity. Harvested at optimal maturity and sun-dried naturally. Stored in moisture-proof facilities to prevent fungus.

name: Moong dal
description: Organic split green gram with bright yellow color. Quick-cooking (15 mins) with high protein content (24g/100g). Grown without chemical pesticides. Perfect for khichdi, sprouts or dal. Each batch tested for aflatoxin levels.

name: Tur dal
description: Traditional pigeon pea with rich aroma. Cooks in 20 mins to perfect consistency for sambar. Contains essential amino acids lysine & tryptophan. Stone-picked to remove impurities. Shelf life 12 months in airtight containers.

name: Rice
description: Gujarati Kolam rice with medium grain length. Non-sticky texture ideal for daily meals. Aged for 6 months for reduced moisture content. Cooks fluffy with distinct aroma. Perfect for pulao, biryani or steamed rice.

name: Masoor dal
description: Skinless red lentils with quick cooking time (12 mins). Rich source of plant-based iron (6.5mg/100g). Grown organically in Saurashtra region. Turns golden when cooked with mild earthy flavor. No added preservatives.

name: Chana dal
description: Split Bengal gram with golden-yellow hue. High fiber content aids digestion. Slow-release carbohydrates provide sustained energy. Perfect for dal, snacks like chakli or sweets. Contains essential minerals like zinc and magnesium.

name: Wheat
description: MP Sharbati wheat with high gluten content. Produces elastic dough perfect for tandoori rotis. Grown in Gangetic plains with organic manure. Grains have natural shine with 12% moisture content. Milled to preserve bran layer nutrients.

name: Tur dal

name: Urad dal
